name: Slay the Relics Exporter
description:
This mod exports data to Slay the Relics Twitch extension. 

This mod in combination with the extension displays tooltips for viewers on stream for relics, potions, player/monster powers, orbs, even some custom tooltips from some mods. 
The viewers just need to hover over the respective item just as if they were in the game themselves.

See the extension config on Twitch for setup instructions (search 'Slay the Relics').
